name: downloadminecraftjarchecksum
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool minecraft_forge_optifine.
Tool description: This api is used to get version list and download for Minectaft, Forge and Optifine.
API description: Fetches the SHA-1 checksum of a specified Minecraft version JAR file from the Nitroxenon Minecraft Forge API.

minecraftversion.description: The version of Minecraft to fetch the JAR checksum for.
